Great inventions keep the world moving forward and make life easier. Time Magazine in the US made a list of the most important inventions of the year. Letâ€™s take a look at a few of them.

People seldom realize how great of an invention the pencil was. It can write at any angle. The harder you press, the darker the shades get. And marks can be erased. For years, computer engineers have been trying to create a digital pencil with the same functions. Finally, Apple made an exciting product called the Apple Pencil. It allows users to draw, paint or write on a screen, just as they would on a piece of paper.
